name: Entfremdung
description:
'Since labor is only an expression of human activity within alienation, of the manifestation of life as the alienation of life, the division of labor, too, is therefore nothing else but the estranged, alienated positing of human activity as a real activity of the species or as activity of man as a species-being.' - Karl Marx, Economic and Philosophic Manuscripts of 1844

Comments/criticisms/thoughts are welcome.

Please contact me at colestia3@gmail.com.

If you like the games I'm making, please consider supporting me on Patreon. Every little bit helps me keep working on new far-left games!
